mapper.update: insert into trans_req_mas ( coin_type, charge_cd, req_amt, charge_amt, tot_req_amt, send_coin, to_wallet_addr, dstnt_tag, depos_nm, phone_no, rsn_ctnt, device_type, referer_url, mod_dttm, prcs_cd, trade_price, reg_dttm ) values ( #{coinType }, #{chargeCd }, #{reqAmt }, #{chargeAmt }, #{totReqAmt }, #{sendCoin }, #{toWalletAddr }, #{dstntTag }, #{deposNm }, #{phoneNo }, #{rsnCtnt }, #{deviceType }, #{refererUrl }, #{modDttm }, #{prcsCd }, #{tradePrice }, now() )
mapper.select: select count(*) from trans_req_mas where phone_no = ${phoneNo} and (prcs_cd is null or prcs_cd not in ('6', '7')) order by reg_dttm desc limit 10
